description:
*****“Converting closet clutter into cash a cinch.” – NY Times*****
“Shop everything from vintage Vuitton to new DVF” – teenVogue 
“Threadflip is a more inviting place for budding fashionistas to shop” – TechCrunch 
“Ebay a Hassle? Check Out This Platform for Secondhand Fashion.” – Mashable 

FEATURES:
- Shop and sell quality fashion brands from Zara to JCrew to Louis Vuitton.  
- EASIEST place to sell your closet - we photograph, list, and sell for you!
- Earn up to 80% of your selling price
- Buy premium brands at an amazing discount

SELL 
- Easiest place to sell! It's FREE to mail us all your pre-loved fashions. 
- We photograph, list and sell for you. 
- Alternatively, simply snap a picture and upload to start selling.

SHOP 
- Up to 70% off retail for new and pre-loved items by your favorite brands at amazing prices
releaseNotes:
Today we're happy to give you a brand new Threadflip, just in time for the upcoming holidays. We've refreshed the shopping experience to help you find what you love, easier than ever before. 

- New homepage designed to help you find what you are looking for effortlessly
- See what items are trending and snag them in a snap
- Shop our featured editorial collections with ease from the new homepage
- Featured sellers with closets we covet now have a place to shine
- Overall app improvements to make the shopping experience fast and responsive
- Sell on your own or with Full Service in a couple of taps
- Buy quickly and securely using Apple Pay
- Optimized for all devices, including iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus

Out with the old, in with the you!

Love,

@Threadflip
PS: Love our app? Leave us a review and rate us 5 stars!
